message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,000.  I think you'll be very happy with it.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $9,000 for it.

Bob, thanks for your counter. I understand your position, but $9,000 is quite a bit lower than I can accept. How about we meet in the middle at $10,000? It's a fair price that reflects the true value of this product.
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $9,500 for the product. This still aligns with my budget while acknowledging the value of the item.
